# Automated Genome Assembly Toolkit and Evaluator (AGATE) Workflow

[![Nextflow](https://img.shields.io/badge/nextflow-%E2%89%A522.10.1-brightgreen.svg)](https://www.nextflow.io/)
[![License: GPL v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPL%20v3-blue.svg)](https://github.com/NBISweden/Earth-Biogenome-Project-pilot/blob/main/LICENSE)

> **A scalable, automated Nextflow pipeline for reference-quality genome assembly.**

This is the official documentation for the **AGATE workflow**, a workflow designed to transform raw long-read sequencing data into curated, high-quality reference genomes in compliance with EBP standards.

[Get Started](installation.qmd){ .btn .btn-primary } [View on GitHub](https://github.com/NBISweden/Earth-Biogenome-Project-pilot){ .btn }

---

## Pipeline Overview

The workflow automates the assembly from raw reads to a polished assembly. It handles input validation, assembly, contamination removal, and quality control.

```mermaid
graph TD
    Input[("ğŸ“‚ Raw Data<br/>(PacBio HiFi, ONT, Hi-C)")] --> QC[("ğŸ” QC & Inspection<br/>(FastK, GenomeScope)")]
    QC --> Assembly[("âš™ï¸ Assembly<br/>(HiFiasm)")]
    Assembly --> Decon[("ğŸ¦  Decontamination<br/>(FCS-GX)")]
    Decon --> Purge[("ğŸ§¹ Purge Duplicates")]
    Purge --> Polishing[("âœ¨ Polishing")]
    Polishing --> Scaffolding[("ğŸ—ï¸ Scaffolding<br/>(Hi-C Integration)")]
    Scaffolding --> FinalQC[("ğŸ“Š Final Validation<br/>(BUSCO, Merqury, Quast)")]
    FinalQC --> Output[("ğŸ“¦ Final Assembly ready for Manual curation")]

    style Input fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style Output fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style Assembly fill:#dfd,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
````

The after the assembly has been scaffolded, we recommend using complementary workflows provided by [Sanger - Tree of Life](https://pipelines.tol.sanger.ac.uk/pipelines).

- Post scaffolding decontamination:
    - Blobtoolkit: <https://pipelines.tol.sanger.ac.uk/blobtoolkit>
    - ASCC: <https://pipelines.tol.sanger.ac.uk/ascc>
- Manual Curation
    - TreeVal: https://pipelines.tol.sanger.ac.uk/treeval
    - CurationPretext: https://pipelines.tol.sanger.ac.uk/curationpretext
    - PretextView: <https://github.com/sanger-tol/PretextView/releases>
    - AGP / TPF Utils: <https://github.com/sanger-tol/agp-tpf-utils>
- Earth Biogenome Project Reporting
    - EAR: https://pipelines.tol.sanger.ac.uk/ear
